title: aram
body: so i just played a match with riot gun and we had a nice team but the enemy had jana soraka and sona the teams heals and stuns completly trumped everything we could throw, we got close to a tie towards the end but due to the unbalanced beginning it just ended badly, ive noticed lots of aram games have been not as balanced, and lots of repeat champions. any future plans for the game mode? updates or anything available to be leaked out

replies.body:
Hah. Haha. No.

Riot pretty much leaves ARAM alone to do its own thing, unbalanced as it might be. It's even worse for Dominion. I legitimately don't remember the last time they did anything to that game mode at all.
yeah its a shame i really love aram and id enjoy dominion but noone plays and the wait is so long, i feel like they should pitch it for a new game mode

On one hand, it feels like a shame to just scrap it. On the other, I really, really liked Ascension and would love to have it back in place of Dominon.

It was nice having a legit team deathmatch mode for a while.
